com.compendium.core.db
Class DBGroupCode

java.lang.Object
  com.compendium.core.db.DBGroupCode

public class DBGroupCode
extends java.lang.Object

The DBGroupCode class serves as the interface layer between the GroupCode data and the GroupCode table in the database.

The GroupCode table holds the relationships between the CodeGroup and Code tables. i.e. what codes have been assigned to what code groups.

Author:
Michelle Bachler

Method Detail

insert

public static boolean insert(DBConnection dbcon,
                             java.lang.String sCodeID,
                             java.lang.String sCodeGroupID,
                             java.lang.String sAuthor,
                             java.util.Date dCreationDate,
                             java.util.Date dModificationDate)
                      throws java.sql.SQLException
Inserts a new groupcode record in the database and return if successful.

Parameters:
DBConnection - dbcon com.compendium.core.db.management.DBConnection, the DBConnection object to access the database with.
sCodeID, - the code id for the new groupcode record.
sCodeGroupID, - the id of code group the code is being added to.
sAuthor, - the author who added the code to the code group.
dCreationDate - java.util.Date, the creation date of the code being added to the group.
dModificationDate - java.util.Date, the last modification date for the code being added to the group (same as creation).
Returns:
boolean, true if it was successful, else false.
Throws:
java.sql.SQLException

delete

public static boolean delete(DBConnection dbcon,
                             java.lang.String sCodeID,
                             java.lang.String sCodeGroupID)
                      throws java.sql.SQLException
Delete the given code, groupcode record from the database and returns it if successful

Parameters:
DBConnection - dbcon com.compendium.core.db.management.DBConnection, the DBConnection object to access the database with.
sCodeID, - the code id for the record to delete.
sCodeGroupID, - the id of code group for the record to delete.
Returns:
boolean, true if it was successful, else false.
Throws:
java.sql.SQLException

getCodeGroups

public static java.util.Vector getCodeGroups(DBConnection dbcon,
                                             java.lang.String sCodeID)
                                      throws java.sql.SQLException
Retrieves all the GroupCodes data for the given CodeID from the database. i.e. What groups is this code in?

Parameters:
DBConnection - dbcon com.compendium.core.db.management.DBConnection, the DBConnection object to access the database with.
sCodeID, - the code id to retrieve the GroupCode records for.

Returns:
Vector, element 1: the CodeGroupID (String); element 2: the CodeGroup description (String).
Throws:
java.sql.SQLException

getGroupCodes

public static java.util.Vector getGroupCodes(DBConnection dbcon,
                                             java.lang.String sCodeGroupID)
                                      throws java.sql.SQLException
Retrieves All the Codes Info in the given CodeGroup from the database. i.e. What codes are in the given code group?

Parameters:
DBConnection - dbcon com.compendium.core.db.management.DBConnection, the DBConnection object to access the database with.
sCodeGroupID, - the codegroup id to retrieve the codes for.

Returns:
Vector, element 1: the CodeID (String); element 2: the Code name (String).
Throws:
java.sql.SQLException

getCodeGroupData

public static java.util.Vector getCodeGroupData(DBConnection dbcon,
                                                java.lang.String sCodeID)
                                         throws java.sql.SQLException
Retrieves All the CodeGroups Info with the given CodeID from the database. i.e. What groupcode records are there for the given CodeID?

Parameters:
DBConnection - dbcon com.compendium.core.db.management.DBConnection, the DBConnection object to access the database with.
sCodeID, - the code id to retrieve the groupcode records for.

Returns:
java.util.Vector, a Vector of Vectors of groupcode data. Each inner Vector contains:
  • CodeGroupID - String
  • Author - String
  • CreationDate - Double (milliseconds)
  • ModificationDate - Double (milliseconds)
    Throws:
    java.sql.SQLException
